page.title: 07CHILDRENS' ORIGINS
page.content: A SURVEY OF WHERE THE RELATIVES OF THE CHILDREN LIVE. Most of the children's relations dont live locally whereas years ago when transport was not so easy people's relations would live locally. Only four people had relations who lived locally. Ten people had relations, some of whom were distant, but are all in the U.K. Two people had relations who are all distant but still in the U.K. Seven people had relations who lived abroad. When we made this survey we thought that most people's relations would live locally but we were wrong. The relations who live furthest from us live about 12,000 miles away in New Zealand. The closest relations live in the same village as us.
